entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
